medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil, four selvage; red and white striped ground cloth with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; red appliqué sun pattern and rosette at neck opening; design consists of wide band at chest with multiple color chevron pattern; zoomorphic and geometric patterns within squares formed by red warp stripes and ghost weft stripes.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
